scripts.workspace:dev: cd terraform && terraform workspace select dev || terraform workspace new dev
scripts.workspace:prod: cd terraform && terraform workspace select prod || terraform workspace new prod
scripts.deploy: npm run build:lambda && cd terraform && terraform workspace select dev && terraform apply -var='stage=dev' -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:lambda && npm run workspace:dev && cd terraform && terraform apply -var='stage=dev' -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:lambda && npm run workspace:prod && cd terraform && terraform apply -var='stage=prod' -auto-approve
